sentences.cn: 磨损作用也助长了风的侵蚀.

sentences.en: Abrasion wearis taken as the main wear mode in the experiments.
sentences.cn: 实验中采用磨料磨损的方式.

sentences.en: Bulk handling should ensure that abrasion and mechanical shock are minimized.
sentences.cn: 散装搬运时应注意将摩擦及机械冲击减至最低.

sentences.en: Diamonds have extreme resistance to abrasion.
Erosion of pipes and vessels from abrasion by particles can be serious.
sentences.cn: 由于固体颗粒的磨蚀作用,管子和容器的磨损严重.

sentences.en: For extrudates there are side crushing strength tests, bulk crushing strength tests, abrasion tests.
sentences.cn: 对挤条产品有侧压强度的测试, 堆积强度测试和耐磨测试.

sentences.en: For measuring abrasion of catalyst particles, three basic attrition test apparatus are used.
sentences.cn: 为了测定催化剂颗粒的磨损, 可使用三种基本磨损测试装置.

sentences.en: High mechanical strength, resistance to press, impact resistance to abrasion.
sentences.cn: 机械强度高 、 耐重压 、 耐冲击、耐磨耗.

sentences.en: Lubrication and good abrasion resistance strong, and prolong engine life.
sentences.cn: 润滑性好,抗磨性强, 延长发动机使用寿命.

sentences.en: No longer abrasion and erosion of lining caused by conveyed fluid particles.
sentences.cn: 消除了由于输送介质而产生的对内衬的磨损和腐蚀.

sentences.en: She was treated for cuts and abrasions.
sentences.cn: 她因划伤和擦伤而接受治疗。

sentences.en: The abrasion, press and rigidity of squeegee determine the print quality.
sentences.cn: 刮板的磨损 、 压力和硬度决定印刷质量.

sentences.en: The fibers with moderate abrasion resistance include wool, cotton, and the high wet - modulus rayons.
sentences.cn: 具有中等耐磨损性能的纤维有羊毛 、 棉花和高湿模量粘胶纤维.

sentences.en: There have been attempts to modify the fiber chemically to resist abrasion enhancement.
sentences.cn: 过去曾设法用化学变性方法,提高纤维的抗磨损性能.

sentences.en: This analysis is helpful to the research of derailment and abrasion machenism.
sentences.cn: 该分析有助于脱轨和磨耗机理的探讨.

sentences.en: Tumble abrasion of a fabric is highly dependent on the inherent fiber toughness.
sentences.cn: 织物耐滚磨的能力与纤维固有韧度相关密切.

words.tran_cn: 粗糙的；有研磨作用的；伤人感情的
研磨；磨蚀；[机] 磨损性

trans.tran_cn: 磨损，擦伤处，<喻>摩擦，<地质>磨蚀（作用）
trans.tran_en: the process of rubbing a surface very hard so that it becomes damaged or disappears
